text_block_list.text:
A day off. It was an opportunity, so I was 
wondering where to go after leaving the station――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Oh. Good morning, Trainer-san. 
Heading somewhere?
choice_data_list: I thought I'd just look around. You?
I thought I'd just look around. You?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Something similar. 
As a change of pace, I was thinking of playing some golf.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I know! 
Trainer-san, how about coming with me?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
How about just playing 9 holes? 
We can take it easy, just the two of us.
choice_data_list: Bubble, do you play golf often?
Bubble, do you play golf often?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm～……it's not like I'm particularly invested. It's just one 
of the ways to take a breather. What about you, Trainer-san?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I see! Well, let's just take it easy. 
Even just hitting the ball can feel refreshing.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Huuu……! 
――Hmmm. Seems like I'm in good form today.

She said it was just to take a breather but……she was 
really good! She knew how to handle the clubs and could 
consistently hit the ball into the cup with minimal strokes.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: You think? Thanks!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, it looks like you're doing really 
well too! Your form is getting better and better, 
and the distance of your first shot is increasing.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――I've got it! Since we're doing this, how about we set goals 
for ourselves. Don't you think it'll be more fun that way?

Goals――to start with, I want to hit 『Par』 at least once…… 
to hit the ball in to the cup without needing extra strokes. 
I'm not confident, but I should set my goals high!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
That sounds good. If you can hit it a little further, you 
should be able to do it! Then, what should I aim for～?

I figured it might be a good idea to give Bubble 
Gum Fellow a reward if she achieved her goal.
choice_data_list: I'll buy you some sweets if you do it
I'll buy you some sweets if you do it

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Really? Alright! 
Then――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I'll declare it here. 
On the next shot, I'll get a hole-in-one!

Once again, I was surprised by how high she was aiming. 
I've heard something like that was akin to a miracle……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Though, with that said, I don't want to be the 
only one with a good memory. As thanks for the 
sweets, how about I dedicate this shot to you?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――Huuu!
(Hyuuuu～～～～……tap, roll roll roll……)
(――――Clatter!)

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――How was that? Did you like my shot?

I never thought she was going to make it with one shot! 
I'm even more moved by her ability to make things happen!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, then I'm glad! 
Now, it's your turn Trainer-san. Do your best to aim for par!

In the end, I wasn't able to achieve my goal, 
but I had a great time. And then, as promised――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah, so cute……! I've been wanting to come to 
this shop. The interior and menu are really cute!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Uwah～, it all looks tasty! 
What should I order～!?

As we looked over the menu, we found something amazing. 
『Super Sweet&Dreamy Cute Jumbo Pancake Tower』……!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this is amazing, isn't it!? It's cute and looks 
really tasty! Ooh, there's also a challenge too.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
If you can finish it in 15 minutes, it's free, and you even 
get a present too……Yeah. That sounds good, let's do it!

It was stacked so high, 8 layers of pancakes covered with 
many sweets and lots of cream――it was a crazy amount!

No matter how much she loved sweets, even if she was 
an Uma Musume……wasn't this……practically impossible……!?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
No, I can do it. 
Not even 15 minutes――I'll show you I can beat the record!

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text:
Well then～, the 『Super Sweet&Dreamy Cute Jumbo 
Pancake Tower』 speed eating challenge……begins～♪

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: I'm digging in!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――――Mmmm! So good!

Even though Bubble Gum Fellow was enjoying the 
taste, she still ate at a furious pace. No matter 
how rich the sweets were, she didn't slow down――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――Thanks for the meal!

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text:
A-and finished～! And your time is……wow, 8 minutes 
and 26 seconds! This shop's new record～!!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Alright! Haa～……it was so good. 
It was kind of a shame I had to hurry though.

She really did break the record……! As always, I was impressed 
by how she was able to follow through on her words……!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
You think? It's not a big deal. 
I never say I'll do something I can't.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I can do anything. I believe that. 
That's why if I say I can do it, I just need to show that I can.

In my case, I think 『I'm not sure I can do it, but I'll try』. 
――No, not just me, but most people probably.

But, Bubble Gum Fellow is different. Her strength……it's not just 
that her ability is high, she also 『Strongly believes in herself』

――I want to believe like her. I want to do my best to believe in 
her strength. I'll declare it. I want to have that same outlook……
choice_data_list: I believe in you too! You can do anything!
I believe in you too! You can do anything!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! Is that your declaration? 
Nice, it's really good!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――Yeah, just believe in me. Just watch me from the best seat. 
No matter when or what it is, I'll show you I can do it.

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text:
This is the reward for completing the challenge, a set 
of plushies～! We can even take a picture in commemeration～!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah～, so cute! 
Trainer-san, let's get a picture together!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Here, hold this puppy!

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text:
Well then, here goes! 
Both of you get closer～! Okay, cheese!

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text: ――Okaaay, here's the picture. Another present♪

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much! 
Ahaa, Trainer-san, your picture came out so cutely!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Look. While holding the puppy, you seem just a little sheepish. 
Fufuu――you're really cute Trainer-san.

It was a little embarrassing to be in the photo but…… 
Bubble Gum Fellow looked like she was having fun the 
entire time, so it was still a fulfilling day.
